title: Airworthiness Directives; The Boeing Company Airplanes

applicability_rules.additional_conditions: Further flight is prohibited until the airplane is inspected and all applicable corrective actions are performed using a method approved by the Manager, AIR-520, Continued Operational Safety Branch, FAA.

raw_applicability_text:
This emergency AD applies to all The Boeing Company airplanes, certificated in any category, as identified in paragraphs (c)(1) through (3) of this emergency AD.
(1) Model MD-11 and MD-11F airplanes.
(2) Model MD-10-10F and MD-10-30F airplanes.
(3) Model DC-10-10, DC-10-10F, DC-10-15, DC-10-30, DC-10-30F (KC-10A and KDC-10), DC-10-40, and DC-10-40F airplanes.
